title: How to get out of full screen mode if ctrl+shift+enter does not work ?
body: i cannot seem te see a think bcs i set my game in full screen and i can't get out of it..try so manytimes ctrl*shift*enter but doesn't work at all...is there any other way how to quit fast cos i am in middle of a game right now :'(

replies.body: Try using alt+enter to switch between fullscreen and windowed. Lemme know if that works better!
